Package vendingmachine

Class VendingMachine

java.lang.Object
vendingmachine.VendingMachine
public class VendingMachine extends Object
This program reads candies and their ingredients from a file. It then asks the user which of those ingredients they like/dislike. Finally, it rates the candies and tells the user which ones they would probably like.

  • Method Details

    • readCandyFile

      private static void readCandyFile() throws FileNotFoundException
      Read the candy information from the file called StockOfCandies.txt. The file should be formatted like this: candy name:ingredient 1, ingredient 2 Initializes the candies list and the ingredientMap.
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - if the StockOfCandies.txt file cannot be found.

    • getUserPreferences

      private static void getUserPreferences()
      For each ingredient found in any candy, ask the user if they like, dislike, or are neutral about that ingredient.

    • findLikedCandies

      private static Set<Candy> findLikedCandies()
      Present candies that you think the user will like based upon their likes and dislikes and what the candies contain. It will not suggest any candidates that contain ingredients the user dislikes. It will give a score to candies that contain only ingredients the user likes. A higher score is better.
      Returns:
      the candies that this user would probably like

    • offerCandies

      private static void offerCandies(Set<Candy> possible)
      Outputs the list of candies to the screen
      Parameters:
      possible - the candies to output

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      Reads the candies from a file, asks the user for their likes and dislikes, and makes an offer
      Parameters:
      args - none
